name: Lady Thalia and the Masterpiece of Moldavia
name_original: Lady Thalia and the Masterpiece of Moldavia
description:
Lady Thalia is back in London and back to her old tricks, putting up with Britain’s social elite by day so she can steal from them by night. But that doesn’t mean things are easy, what with her husband (of convenience) back from abroad and a new detective hot on her trail. Still, she’s not going to let those little things distract her from pulling off the heist of her career, even if she needs a bit of help to do it…

Created for Spring Thing 2023. Please check out the rest of the entries before the competition ends on May 13, 2023!
